name: Server Preserver
description:
Huh... it seems everyone else in your office decided to take the day off, on the same day. This means you've been left in charge of maintaining the web servers until everyone gets back. Unfortunately, there seems to be extremely heavy internet traffic today, and the servers are very demanding about what items they need in order to keep running.

CONTROLS:
WASD - Move
Mouse - Look Around
Left Click - Pick up/Throw
Space - Jump
Escape - Options (Music Disable and Mouse Sensitivity)

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 49 https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/server-preserver
